description: Fighting in Heaven is a bit different than normal: one can go all in since there's no damage to recover from.  This variation is focused on a mix between style and elegance brandishing exotic weapons, with equal parts brute force.  Like ballet but deadly.
initiate: You relax yourself and prepare to enter combat.

static_buffs.name: Celestial stance (Oarfish)
static_buffs.description: Your poise allows you to easily evade incoming attacks.  Like a fish swimming through, your evasion is increased while your blocking chance is decreased.

//: Not sure if block_effectiveness is block chance. block seems to be block value, so it makes the other block stat is related to chance

onhit_buffs.name: Dance combo
onhit_buffs.description: Allows using Earthen crescent after landing attacks.

oncrit_buffs.name: Celestial elegance (evasion)
oncrit_buffs.description: Landing effective hits on enemies is electrifying, it allows you to evade attacks more easily.

oncrit_buffs.name: Celestial elegance (movement)
oncrit_buffs.description: Landing effective hits on enemies is electrifying, it increases your movement speed.

onmove_buffs.name: Celestial grace (debuff)
onmove_buffs.description: Moving decreases damage done and evasion immediately after.  Dampening.

onpause_buffs.name: Lighting step
onpause_buffs.description: "Grounding" a portion of the stored charge keeps the energy flowing.

onpause_buffs.name: Grounded
onpause_buffs.description: Allows using Ionic whip and Shock step after grounding.

description: Fighting in Heaven is a bit different than normal: one can go all in since there's no damage to recover from.  This variation is a further simplification that focuses on applying excessive force with little, if any, proper defensive maneuvers.  Not that you needed them before anyways.
initiate: You enter a combat stance and hope for an interesting fight.

static_buffs.name: Celestial stance (Fallen)
static_buffs.description: You're used to do as much damage as possible without care for your safety.  Solid as a keystone, your chance to land hits is increased, you're immune to throws, and evasive actions are reduced.

onhit_buffs.name: Sphere of perception
onhit_buffs.description: Effective attacks allow you to briefly read the spirit of the target.  You're more aware of their actions…

oncrit_buffs.name: Sphere of non-perception (debuff)
oncrit_buffs.description: …Which interfers with your own focus.  Landing critical attacks prevents your next attack from being as effective.

onpause_buffs.name: Focus
onpause_buffs.description: You take your time considering the best course of action in breaking through your opponent's defenses.

description: Your good, old and reliable personal fighting style, now in the former of a proper martial art.  It focuses in weaving blows between your hard hitting arm, and the harder hitting one.

static_buffs.name: Wild brawling
static_buffs.description: Improves your parry while unarmed.  Also allows you to regenerate natural energy while in unarmed combat.
static_buffs.//: The +mana on hit is granted by buff_kasen_onhit_eoc

onhit_buffs.name: Natural attunement
onhit_buffs.//: Dummy buff to tell the player Kasen is regenerating energy after hitting something

onhit_eocs.//: 0 represents her left hand, 1 represents her right hand
onhit_eocs.//2: She should always hit harder with her left hand (brute force), but apply special effects with her right hand (soul dmg)
onhit_eocs.//3: Every time she uses 0 it has a chance to swap her next attack (1), and every time she uses 1 she defaults to 0 again
onhit_eocs.//4: This means that she will be attacking with her left hand more than with her right hand

onblock_buffs.name: Natural action
onblock_buffs.description: The more laws and orders are made prominent, the more thieves and bandits there will be.  Parrying with one hand prepares you to parry with the opposite.

onblock_eocs.//: If she blocked with 0, it swaps to 1, else if she blocked with 1 it swaps to 0

ondodge_buffs.name: Flow
ondodge_buffs.description: The path that can be walked through is not the way.  Evading attacks increase your parry chance, but makes it more difficult to evade sucessive attacks.

description: Noh is an artistic expression encompassing theater, dance and music.  You are a menreiki, the embodiment of the art, naturally skilled in performing it.  You can use it as a martial art, based on combining movement between attacks.
initiate: You relax yourself and adopt a staging pose.
%s relaxes and adopts a staging pose.

static_buffs.name: One-mask-party (small weapon)
static_buffs.description: Yourself, basically.  You get different buffs according to your currently equipped weapon.  Small (1h) weapons grant extra evasions per turn.
static_buffs.//: It would be AMAZING if she can set her weapon swap speed to zero too, so she can actually battle dance

static_buffs.name: One-mask-party
static_buffs.description: Yourself, basically.  You get different buffs according to your currently equipped weapon.  Large (2h) weapons grant extra parries per turn.

onhit_buffs.name: Cadence
onhit_buffs.description: Successful attacks grant you increased movement speed.

onblock_buffs.name: Parry (large weapon)
onblock_buffs.description: By parrying incoming attacks, you get excited and increase your chances to land effective attacks.

ondodge_buffs.name: Reposition (small weapon)
ondodge_buffs.description: By evading incoming attacks, you reposition and increase your chances to land effective attacks.

onpause_buffs.name: Emphasize (small weapon)
onpause_buffs.description: Proper stops highlight the message.  Stopping increases your evasion for an instant.

onpause_buffs.name: Emphasize (large weapon)
onpause_buffs.description: Proper stops highlight the message.  Stopping increases your parry value and attempts for an instant.

description: Though Tai Chi is often seen as a form of mental and physical exercise, it is a legitimate martial art, focused on self-defense.  By reading qi, you're able to parry more and better.  Parrying also greatly increases counter damage, while pausing for a second improves your response to physical damage and gives you insight on foe's weak points.
initiate: You settle into a gentle stance and prepare to defend yourself.

static_buffs.name: Tai Chi Stance (Youkai)
static_buffs.description: You are focused on defending a position and predicting your opponents attacks.  This enables extra blocks that scale from your physical skills, at the cost of reducing your evasion.

onblock_buffs.name: Opening found
onblock_buffs.description: Your no-nonsense positioning allows you to deal bonus damage immediately after blocking attacks.  Also, you gain extra accuracy, virtue of recognizing and reacting to movement patterns.

onblock_buffs.name: Counter block
onblock_buffs.description: Allows using "Repulse the intruder" and "Stay out" after blocking attacks.

onpause_buffs.name: Great Wall
onpause_buffs.description: By taking a second to enter a guarding stance, you prepare yourself to redirect the qi of the next enemy attack through their own defenses.

onpause_buffs.name: Redirected qi
onpause_buffs.description: Allows using Qi burst after pausing.

description: Mokou's fighting style, learned over centuries of brawling, killing and being killed by her rival.  It's brutal, dirty, effective yet simple: hit and hit harder.
initiate: You prepare yourself to fight once more.
//block: I feel the blocking formula relies on those two fields plus the character's physical skills to block attacks. If that's not the case, ALL arm_block and leg_block fields in this file should be removed

static_buffs.name: Immortal experience
static_buffs.description: Your fighting skill allows you to block more damage, scaling from strength and dexterity.  Your physical damage is also above average.
static_buffs.//: Change the mult_bonuses for a 0.85 + rand(0.5) when possible
static_buffs.//2: Do note she also has the KI_STRIKE mutation, so her unarmed dmg is already scaling from skills

onattack_buffs.name: Hourai's high
onattack_buffs.description: Attacks have an increased chance to be effective.

ongethit_buffs.name: Every hit counts
ongethit_buffs.description: Repeatedly getting hit increases your accuracy and blocking chance for a short duration.

//2: That description assuming block_effectiveness is blocking chance

onpause_buffs.name: One second against eternity
onpause_buffs.description: Not used to stop in the middle of a fight, your accuracy and physical damage is reduced.  At the same time, this slightly increases your dodge chance.

onkill_buffs.name: That which is unattainable
onkill_buffs.description: Life is something curious: you can easily take it from everyone, except for the targets of your grudge.  Once you get going it's easier for you to do it.

description: Your personal fighting style, learned over decades of sword training, plus some gardening component that helped too.  People say you may just be *too* tunnel-visioned about it.
initiate: You take a firm grasp of your weapon.

static_buffs.name: Kenjutsu (incomplete)
static_buffs.description: You were trained in the art of the sword.  Although you didn't reach completion, you're still very skilled at it.  Grants improved block, increased damage and reduced crit chance when using eastern swords.
static_buffs.//4: Removed the stat dodge bonus as her spells scale from dodge now
static_buffs.//crit: Youmu has reduced crit to rely on her martial art procs

onattack_buffs.name: Training results
onattack_buffs.description: Direct your attacks towards maximizing the effectiveness of your attacks.  Muscle memory with swords that can cut anything reduces the efficacy of blunt and piercing damage.

oncrit_buffs.name: Phantasmal strike
oncrit_buffs.description: Landing effective attacks is more and more easy once you get going.  Additionally, increases your parries per turn.

onmove_buffs.name: Half-phantom walk
onmove_buffs.description: Stride like a spirit (and hit like one).

//3: Removed the stat dodge bonus as her spells scale from dodge now

onpause_buffs.name: Half-phantom rest
onpause_buffs.description: Pause, clear your mind, and prepare yourself for what follows, increasing accuracy and greatly increasing crit chance.  Ever heard about the concept of emptiness, though? Way harder than it sounds, like trying to think about no thing.
